channel.title: World of Warcraft
channel.description: Hey I just recently got the game World of Warcraft i was surfing the net getting some info on it and found there are bots and exploits for that game too... all the websites required me to pay and sign up i was wondering if anyone in this community played this game and if so plz list some of the exploits you know of i could really use the help thanks phatal

item.title: World of Warcraft
item.dc:creator: @RegeX RegeX
item.description:
@RegeX wrote:

Hacking in World of Warcraft really isn’t worth it, neither is seemingly “undetectable” botting, e.g WowGlider.
I have found the game to be actual fun, and having been banned once, I tell you shelling out $80 or whatever for a new game just to cheat for a bit simply isn’t worth it.

The actual gameplay is good for once, just play it properly.

Read full topic
